title: 12 | form表单：熟练掌握form表单操作步骤

comments.comment_content:
错误：
username = self.driver.find_element_by_id('username').send_keys('admin')
print(username.get_attribute())
正确：
username = self.driver.find_element_by_id('username')
pwd = self.driver.find_element_by_id('pwd')
username.send_keys('admin')
pwd.send_keys('123')
print(username.get_attribute())
print(pwd.get_attribute())

为什么浏览器自动关闭了呢
from selenium import webdriver
import os
from time import sleep
class Testcase(object):
    def __init__(self):
        self.driver = webdriver.Chrome()
        path=os.path.dirname(os.path.abspath(__file__))
        print(path)
        filepath='file:///'+path+'/form.html'
        print(filepath)
        self.driver.get(filepath)
        sleep(5)


if __name__ =='__main__':
    case=Testcase()
